overview: Starring Rei Dan, this is the third film directed by Yutaka Mizutani.  Riko Hanamura (Rei Dan) is the leader of a local amateur symphony orchestra, which has been active with members who love music very much. However, Riko is not doing well, and she finally decides to disband the orchestra after 18 years of operation. She plans to hold the last farewell concert...
title: Sun and Bolero
